{{ title }}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { DataService } from "../../services/data.service"; import { AuthService } from "../../services/auth.service"; @Component({ selector: 'movies-item-details', templateUrl: './movies-item-details.component.html', styleUrls: ['./movies-item-details.component.css'] }) export class MoviesItemDetailsComponent implements OnInit { public image = ''; public title?: string = ''; public year?: string; public description?: string; public id?: string | undefined; constructor(private dataService: DataService, public authService: AuthService, private route: ActivatedRoute) { } ngOnInit() { let id: string = ''; this.route.paramMap .subscribe((params: any) => { id = params.get('id'); }); console.log(id); this.dataService.getById(id).subscribe((res: any) => { console.log("test2"); console.log(res['image']); this.image = res['image']; this.title = res['title']; }); } delete() { return this.authService.authenticate(this.credentials).subscribe((result) => { if (result) { this.dataService. this.logout = false; this.credentials = { login: '', password: '' }; this.router.navigate(['/']); } }); } }
